casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. ROGERS
v.
DEPT. OF REHAB. & CORR. 2017-0331 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 20, 2019

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On application for attorney fees and court costs filed January 4, 2019. The fees hereinafter approved are reasonable, and James J. Leo is granted attorney fees in the sum of $10,206.00, which amount is ordered payable by the Ohio Department of Rehabilitation & Correction directly to James J. Leo.
